name: SpaceBear
description:
Desmond the Spacebear

Desmond is looking for a new homeplanet. It's getting pretty hot and the polar ice caps are melting. Help him to reach the fuel at the end of the planets, so he can travel to neptune.

Use 'left' and 'right' to move. Press 'X' to jump and walljump.

DONT USE FIREFOX! :D
